actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the segment tax on domestic air transportation shall not apply to segments to or from certain islands.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt flight segments of 30 miles or less beginning or ending on certain small islands from the segment tax on domestic air transportation.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the segment tax on domestic air transportation shall not apply to segments to or from certain islands.
